originalText.text: My family is incredibly grateful to Manhattan Jewish Funeral Home for all they did to help us in our time we need. They went above and beyond to help us honor our loved one’s wishes. They were extremely responsive and timely in communication. Ron was especially helpful in guiding us through the process.

text.text: My family is incredibly grateful to Manhattan Jewish Funeral Home for all they did to help us in our time we need. They went above and beyond to help us honor our loved one’s wishes. They were extremely responsive and timely in communication. Ron was especially helpful in guiding us through the process.

originalText.text: MJHF provided seamless services and assistance during a difficult time.  They were responsive to our constraints or needs, limiting communications and requests to the strict necessary under the circumstances.

text.text: MJHF provided seamless services and assistance during a difficult time.  They were responsive to our constraints or needs, limiting communications and requests to the strict necessary under the circumstances.

originalText.text: Speaking and communicating with Michael Lanza from the Manhattan Jewish Funeral Home made a very upsetting and difficult time so much easier to handle.  He was so supportive, caring and attentive.  He was so quick to answer any questions or handle any concerns or issues that came up  He always made himself accessible and was very easy to get in touch with.  He has a big heart and was there for me and my family when we really needed him.  I am so thankful to have had him by my side.  I don't know how we would have gotten through this very difficult time without him.

text.text: Speaking and communicating with Michael Lanza from the Manhattan Jewish Funeral Home made a very upsetting and difficult time so much easier to handle. originalText.text: I’ve been meaning to create this review for a while but had so much to say that editing was fairly difficult task. I had the unfortunate need to use Manhattan Jewish Funeral Home two times over the past few years and continue to be impressed with the overwhelming courtesy, concern and professionalism from the staff who worked alongside Colonial Funeral Home in Staten Island. Fran, the liaison from Manhattan Jewish, helped me with paperwork on more than several occasions and informed me about services I would never have known about if it weren’t for her.  Tom, from Colonial, helped arrange for the funeral, flight of my sister from Florida to NY, and acted as an intermediary between the Florida funeral home for me. Tom was beyond kind when I had to make arrangements and was a true Knight in Shining Armor at the cemetery. My first experience at Colonial was in 2019 with Michael, and he was a Godsend in an otherwise nightmare. In fact, all of the staff at Manhattan Jewish and Colonial Funeral Home are consummate professionals who have helped me through the most difficult times I ever had to endure. I would highly recommend Manhattan Jewish Funeral Home and Colonial Funeral Home to anyone who may need their services.

originalText.text: I worked with Michael and the whole experience was seamless. I lost my father due to COVID and Michael made this horrible loss more manageable by making my father's end of life process so smooth. Their response is amazing even during this time of crisis. I would highly recommend their services. They treat you like family.
